name: Free Falling Fluffs
description:
Free falling Fluff is a skydiving simulator with fluffy creatures

drag them around to avoid blocks on your way down

CONTROLS : 

Drag and drop the fluffs with your mouse

TIPS  : 

Avoid the blocks

goodluck <3
